name: PiggyBank
0:
”Alexa ask piggy bank”
”create a piggy bank for Christina”
”add ten dollars to Christina”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: piggy bank
des:
The Piggy Bank skill allows the creation of accounts for individual people. The Piggy Banks can teach adults and kids about being responsible with money and the value of saving. The skill provides a convenient way to make changes and check balances.

Here are some sample phrases:
create a piggy bank for Steve
set balance to 100 dollars for jeff
add 4 dollars to Jose
remove Steve
list balances
list accounts
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
